modName: Gifts of the Outsider - Dishonored in Skyrim
summary: Imagine if the worlds of Skyrim and Dishonored were merely different realities in the same universe. What if the Outsider, a being beyond worlds, could traverse across these realities? Well this mod explores that idea by bringing the Outsider, the void and Corvos abilities to Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[img=center]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/35564-1-1376249345.png[/img]

[img=center]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/35564-1-1376142347.png[/img]
[CENTER][SIZE=+2]Imagine if the worlds of Skyrim and Dishonored were merely different realities in the same universe. What if the Outsider, a being beyond worlds, could traverse across these realities? Well this mod explores that idea by bringing the Outsider, the void and Corvos abilities to Skyrim.[/SIZE][/CENTER]

[CENTER][youtube]qCtBm7SuPFM[/youtube][/center]

[img=center]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/35564-1-1376143433.png[/img]
[SIZE=+1]This mod adds the six signature abilities of Dishonored into Skyrim through a quest featuring fully voice acted Outsider.[/SIZE]
 
[SIZE=+1]The spells are as follows:[/SIZE]
[COLOR=DarkTurquoise]Blink:[/COLOR] Leap across distances instantaneously.
[COLOR=DarkTurquoise]Void Gaze:[/COLOR] See in darkness and detect beings through walls
[COLOR=DarkTurquoise]Devouring Swarm:[/COLOR] Summon a horde of rats to distract or kill your opponents
[COLOR=DarkTurquoise]Possession:[/COLOR] Take control of a being, appearing directly behind them once the effect has ended.
[COLOR=DarkTurquoise]Wind Blast:[/COLOR] Blast away your opponents with a powerful gust of wind.
[COLOR=DarkTurquoise]Bend Time:[/COLOR] Slow time to a crawl for everyone but yourself. Great for escaping a difficult situation.
[COLOR=DarkTurquoise]Shadow Kill:[/COLOR] Enemies caught unaware are reduced to dust when dispatched with a kill move. Dust piles do not arouse suspicion with guards or other enemies.

If you wish to add the spells without completing the quest then simply use the help command from the console menu. Use help “<spell name here>” to return the spell id. Then use player.addspell <spell id here> to add it.

[img=center]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/35564-2-1376143434.png[/img]
You can begin the quest by heading to abandoned houses on the shores of Lake Honrich, west of Riften. Inside you will find a book, \'Spirit of the Deep\', pick it up and you will begin your journey. 

Once you have left The Void you will be tasked with finding the runes of power. Here are their rough locations: 
[COLOR=DarkTurquoise]Void Gaze[/COLOR] - This can be found beneath the walkway to the college of Winterhold 
[COLOR=DarkTurquoise]Devouring Swarm[/COLOR] - This can be found beneath Riften, in the Ratway tunnels, after the Ragged Flagon.
[COLOR=DarkTurquoise]Possession[/COLOR] - Is located on a hill above Falkreath cemetery. 
[COLOR=DarkTurquoise]Wind Blast[/COLOR] - In the mountains north of Markarth 
[COLOR=DarkTurquoise]Bend Time[/COLOR] - In the hills north east of Solitude
[COLOR=DarkTurquoise]Shadow Kill[/COLOR] - In the volcanic tundra south of Windhelm

[img=center]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/35564-3-1376143434.png[/img]
Thanks goes to the talented Matthew Wade for voicing the outsider. Check out his [url=http://www.matthewwade.co.uk/]website[/url] if you are looking for an excellent voice actor.

Thanks also goes to Bethesda and Arkane Studios for making Dishonored. The inspiration behind the mod.

[img=center]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/35564-4-1376143434.png[/img]
If you have any suggestions or problems please let me know in the comments.
author: Madrilous

files.name: Gifts of the Outsider V 1_0_1
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed the CTD issues
Potentially fixed a bug which occasionally prevented the outsider from initiating a conversation
